comment._content: whats it say on the page behind the pic??

comment.author: 8252313@N05
8252313@N05
comment._content:
Second attempt, thanks to some Twitter buddies:

Dutch:
Dat dinstrumenten daerbinnen dese moelen gebruyct zullen 
worden zullen wesen van gegoten yser zulcx dat dezelve
nyet zoe haesten zullen cunnen vergaen. 

Translation:
That the instruments used in the mill will be made from cast iron so that they will not speedily decay.
